meaningMnemonic:
People you want to <kanji>take along</kanji> to the <kanji>middle</kanji> of somewhere are probably people you know pretty well. They're your <vocabulary>gang</vocabulary>, they're the <vocabulary>guys</vocabulary>.

This word often has a negative feel to it, though, as in "those guys can't be trusted" or "they're a selfish bunch".
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. As long as you know the readings for these kanji, you should be able to read this word just fine.
